lead_paragraph: Sonny Kapoor and British transplant Muriel Donnelly co-manage The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful, while Sonny juggles plans for expansion and an impending marriage.
snippet: Sonny Kapoor and British transplant Muriel Donnelly co-manage The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful, while Sonny juggles plans for expansion and an impending marriage.
